Name: Browsingway
Author: Styr1x
Description:
Renders browser overlays in-game to enable playing in fullscreen (and G-SYNC) while having access to ACT overlays.
Use the settings button below or the '/bw config' command to configure.
Based on the BrowserHost plugin by ackwell.
Changelog:
-Add 'Disabled' option
-Add 'Mute' option
Add 'ACT optimizations' option (disables overlay when ACT is not running)
- Fix keyboard input and focus handling
- Update Chromium to 108.0.5359.125
- API 8 support
